name: Entropy (itch) (JavsGalego)
description:
Entropy is the arrow of time. 

Feel its unavoidable advance.

Try to repair your surroundings by rewinding time.

Minimize entropy.

This is a fast-paced first-person game in which your surroundings are fated to break and disorganize. Or are they? 

Rewind time to minimize the destruction of entropy! Try to minimize its effect by repairing block constructions. It is not going to be easy! You cannot rewind objects that are blocked and you cannot see. 

This game has been made in 48 as an unofficial entry of the Global Game Jam 2020 with theme "repair". 

A game by JavsGalego

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse left click to rewind time

P to pause
